answers.answer: I am 33 weeks pregnant and I am going to pack mine soon. I don't see why not especially since you've been in and out of the hospital. Sounds like a smart idea better safe than sorry
I am 33 weeks and 3 days too. I have not packed yet but I am putting all I need on the side one by one. It is a good idea that you start.
I packed at at 29wks because I am being monitored 2x a week and they told me I could be sent up at anytime to l&d. I am 31wks now.

Im 32 weeks and I've started packing mine by purchasing travel size shampoo, conditioner, tooth brushes etc... slowly putting it together here and there so when the big day comes I just have to put in a few things and be on my way. Best of luck!
Go ahead and pack I had preclampsia my last 2 pregnancies & went in for a regular check up & ended up in L&d with nothing till my fiancée brought it better safe than sorry (:

question: 33wks+3 and I'M wondering if it would be too soon to pack my hospital bag. I'm only considering it because these past few weeks I've been in and out of the hospital with early advancing symptoms of preeclampsia. Wat do you ladies think?
title: hospital bag
